# gm2-zuc #
## introduce ##
use gm2 and zuc for encryption and decryption.

recommand gm2 for keys exchange, and zuc for stream encryption and decryption.

## compile ##
manual compile

```
$>cd gm_crypto
$>make
$>cp libzgmssl.lib ..
$>cd ..
$>make
````
or use shell

`
$>sh gen.sh
`

## test result ##
